addListTourText.source:
This shows the list of available blocks that can be placed. Add a block by dragging the icon into the page.

When an existing block is selected, some blocks may be greyed out. This indicates which blocks can be placed inside or after the selected block.

artboardOverviewTourText.source: Displays a top level overview of your content.

artboardToolbarButtonTourText.source: Shows the current zoom factor. Click on it to reset the zoom back to 100%.

assistantAddActionDescription.source: Add content using an AI assistant.

assistantAddResultError.source: Failed to add block from assistant.

assistantDialogLead.source: Please enter what you'd like the assistant to generate.

assistantPromptPlaceholder.source: Generate content for a page about how taxes work in Switzerland

blockAddListTourText.source: Right-click on a block to add or remove them from your favorites. Favorites are highlighted and always displayed at the top of the list.

clipboardExplanation.source:
Use Ctrl-V on the page to paste content. These will then be displayed here.

Use Ctrl-F to search for existing content and paste it into the clipboard.
clipboardExplanation.translation:
Utilizzare Ctrl-V sulla pagina per incollare i contenuti. Questi saranno poi visualizzati qui.

Utilizzare Ctrl-F per cercare contenuti esistenti e incollarli negli appunti.

clipboardPasteShortcutHelp.source: Paste text, image or copied blocks

clipboardTourText.source: Drag and drop content pasted from your clipboard into the page to create a matching block.

commandPaletteTourText.source: Easily perform actions using your keyboard by launching the command palette. Most of the features available using clicks is also available in the command palette.

commentsTourText.source: Shows all comments for the current page.

deleteError.source: The block could not be deleted.

diffSidebarTourText.source: Displays all the changes made during editing.

duplicateError.source: The items could not be duplicated.
duplicateError.translation: Gli elementi non possono essere duplicati.

entityTitleTourText.source:
Shows the title and status of the current page.

Click on the title to open the page edit form.

failedToConvert.source: The block could not be converted.

failedToTransform.source: The action "@name" could not be executed.
failedToTransform.translation: The action "@name" could not be executed.

fatalErrorText.source: Unfortunately blökkli has encountered a fatal error which prevents it from working normally. You may be able to continue using it, but things may not work as expected.

feature_add-list_description.source: Provides the container to render a list of blocks to add or add actions.

feature_artboard_description.source: Wraps the entire page in an artboard that can be zoomed and moved using the mouse.

feature_artboard_setting_momentum_descri.source: Applies smooth animations when scrolling or zooming the artboard.

feature_artboard_setting_persist_descrip.source: Stores and restores the last position and zoom factor of the artboard.

feature_assistant_description.source: Provides a dynamic add block action to add one or more blocks generated by an AI assistant.

feature_block-add-list_description.source: Renders a list of block bundles that can be added to the current page.

feature_block-add-list_setting_hideDisab.source: Hides blocks from the "Add List" if they can't be added to anywhere.
Hide blocks that can't be added

feature_clipboard_description.source: Provides clipboard integration to copy/paste existing blocks or paste supported clipboard content like text or images.

feature_clipboard_setting_openSidebarOnP.source: Automatically opens the sidebar when pasting content from the clipboard.

feature_command-palette_description.source: Provides a command palette with search to access most UI features with a keyboard.

feature_conversions_description.source: Provides block actions to convert one or more blocks to a different bundle.

feature_delete_description.source: Provides an action to delete one or more blocks.

feature_diff_description.source: Displays a diff of all changes in the edit state.

feature_dragging-overlay_description.source: Renders an overlay when dragging or placing a block.

feature_duplicate_description.source: Provides an action to duplicate one or more blocks in place.

feature_edit-form_description.source: Listens to edit events and renders an iframe containing the edit form.

feature_edit_description.source: Provides an action to edit a block.

feature_editable-field_description.source: Implements a form overlay to edit a single field of a block.

feature_editable-mask_description.source: Provides a view option to hide non-editable parts of the page.

feature_entity-title_description.source: Renders the title and status of the page entity.

feature_exit_description.source: Provides a menu button to exit the editor without saving.

feature_field-areas_description.source: Provides a view option to render the field areas with labels.

feature_fragments_description.source: Provides way to add content fragments defined by the frontend.

feature_grid_description.source: Provides a view option to render a grid.

feature_help_description.source: Provides a sidebar pane with helpful information on how to use blokkli.

feature_history_description.source: Implements support for history features (undo, redo, list of mutations).

feature_history_setting_useMouseButtons_.source: When enabled you can use the backwards/forwards buttons on your mouse to undo and redo.

feature_import-existing_description.source: Implements a menu action that renders a dialog to import blocks from another entity.

feature_import-existing_setting_showDial.source: Displays the import dialog when starting blökkli if the page is empty.

feature_library_description.source: Implements support for a block library to manage reusable blocks.

feature_media-library_description.source: Implements a media library to easily drag and drop media like images or videos.

feature_multi-select_description.source: Implements support for selecting multiple blocks using a select rectangle.

feature_options_description.source: Renders the options form for one or more blocks.

feature_ownership_description.source: Renders a large button to take ownership of the current edit state.

feature_preview-grant_description.source: Provides a button to open a dialog with a QR code to preview the page on a smartphone.

feature_preview_description.source: Provides a button to open a preview in a new window.

feature_proxy_view_description.source: Displays the blocks as a structure in the preview.

feature_publish_description.source: Provides a menu button to publish the changes of the current entity.

feature_publish_setting_closeAfterPublis.source: Immediately closes the editor after successfully publishing or saving.

feature_responsive-preview_description.source: Provides a responsive preview of the current edit state in an iframe.

feature_revert_description.source: Provides a menu button to revert all changes done on the current entity.

feature_search_description.source: Provides an overlay with shortcut to search for blocks on the current page or existing content to add as blocks.

feature_selection_description.source: Renders an overlay that highlights the selected blocks.

feature_settings_description.source: Provides a menu button to display a settings dialog.

feature_settings_setting_lowPerformanceM.source: Reduces the animations and interactivity to a minimum for devices with low performance.

feature_settings_setting_useAnimations_d.source: Animates UI elements like dialogs or drawers or interactions like drag and drop or scroll changes.

feature_structure_description.source: Provides a sidebar button to render a structured list of all blocks on the current page.

feature_touch-action-bar_description.source: Renders a button on touch devices to cancel touch actions.

feature_tour_description.source: Provides a tour overlay to get to know the editor.

feature_transform_description.source: Provides integration for block transform plugins.

feature_validations_description.source: Provides a sidebar pane to render validations.

fieldAreasTourText.source: Toggle between showing or hiding the areas where blocks can be placed.

fragmentsAddFragmentDescription.source:
Drag the icon into the page to add a fragment block.

Fragments are reusable blocks that always render the same content.

fragmentsPlaceDialogLead.source: Select a block fragment to add to the page.

gridTourText.source: Display a layout grid overlay on top of the page.

helpTourText.source: Shows a list of available shortcuts.

historyTourText.source: See a list of all changes made so far and switch back and forth between changes.

importExistingDialogLead.source: Import content from an existing page. The items will be added to the end of the list. This action can be undone.
importExistingDialogLead.translation: Importa contenuti da una pagina esistente. Gli elementi verranno aggiunti alla fine della lista. Questa azione può essere annullata.

importExistingError.translation: I contenuti non possono essere importati.

importExistingFieldsLabel.source: Which content would you like to import?

importExistingPagesLabel.source: From which page would you like to import?

libraryAddDescription.source: Add a reusable block from the block library.

libraryDialogLead.source: When you add an item to the library, you can use it on multiple pages at the same time. Changes to this item are then immediately published on all pages.
libraryDialogLead.translation: Aggiungendo un elemento alla biblioteca, puoi utilizzarlo su più pagine contemporaneamente. Le modifiche a questo elemento saranno pubblicate immediatamente su tutte le pagine.

libraryDialogReusableInfo.source: The library item will be available for placement on other pages once this page has been published.

libraryError.source: Failed to add block to library.
libraryError.translation: L'elemento non può essere reso riutilizzabile.

libraryPlaceDialogLead.source: Select a reusable block from the library to add it to your layout. You can detach the block later.

maskTourText.source: Toggle between showing or hiding non-editable parts of the page.

mediaLibraryTourText.source: Search for media like images and drag and drop them into the page.

ownershipNote.source: This page is currently being edited by @name. Changes can only be made by one person at a time.
ownershipNote.translation: Questa pagina è attualmente in lavorazione da @name. Le modifiche possono essere effettuate solo da una persona alla volta.

previewDialogLead.source: Scan the QR code with your smartphone to open the preview.
previewDialogLead.translation: Scansiona il codice QR con il tuo smartphone per aprire l'anteprima.

previewNewWindowTourText.source: Opens a preview of the current changes in a new window.

previewQrCodeText.source: You can also copy the link and share it.

previewWithSmartphoneTourText.source: Shows a QR code to quickly open a preview of the changes with your smartphone.

proxyViewTourText.source: Displays the content blocks as a structured view.

publishDescriptionUnpublished.source: Save all changes while keeping page unpublished

publishError.translation: Le modifiche non possono essere pubblicate.

responsivePreviewTourText.source: See how your changes look like on smaller screens, such as smartphones. Click on the "detach" button to be able to select additional viewport sizes.

revertDialogLead.source: This will delete all changes and restore the currently published state. This action cannot be undone.
revertDialogLead.translation: Questo eliminerà tutte le modifiche e ripristinerà lo stato attualmente pubblicato. Questa azione non può essere annullata.

revertError.translation: Le modifiche non possono essere scartate.

revertSuccess.translation: Tutte le modifiche sono state scartate.

searchTourText.source: Quickly find blocks on the current page or existing content to drag and drop as blocks into the page.

structureTourText.source: Shows a structured list of all blocks on the current page. Click on any block to quickly jump to it.

systemRequirementsDialogLead.source: blökkli has detected that your browser does not meet one or more system requirements. For the best experience, please use a browser that supports all the listed requirements.

systemRequirementsDialogText.source: blökkli has been tested and optimized for the latest versions of Chrome, Firefox, Edge, and Safari. Features like WebGL are well supported, but they may sometimes be disabled for performance or security reasons.

systemRequirementsWebglText.source: blökkli uses WebGL for fast rendering of UI elements such as selected blocks and drag-and-drop indicators. If WebGL is not supported, Blökkli will resort to fallback rendering, which is slower and lacks full feature support.

themeTourText.source: Change the colors of the theme and generate a theme file.

tourDescription.source: Explore the features of the editor

tourIntro.source: Explore the most important features of the editor and learn how to get started using blökkli.

translationsBannerText.source: You are currently editing the @language translation. Some features like adding, moving or deleting blocks are not available.

translationsTourText.source: Quickly switch between available translations. A greyed out language indicates the content is not yet translated. Clicking on it opens the form to create a new translation for this language.

validationsTourText.source: See validation errors for content or structure on the current page.
